summary: Community and product leader with 20 years' experience launching, growing, and managing high-impact communities and user groups. Demonstrated success in data-driven strategy, digital and event programming, content creation, and cross-functional collaboration. Excel at combining a user-centric approach with rigorous analysis to develop products and online/offline spaces that drive engagement, learning, and growth. Adept at 0-to-1 launches and scaling programs for diverse technical and non-technical communities.

highlights: Led full re-platform of global e-commerce stack for hospitality brands.
Oversaw in-house and agency engineering teams (14 people).
Built AI-powered software for product data migration in four languages.
Developed dashboards, testing tools, and data-driven processes to support product launches.
Scoped and negotiated third-party tech partnerships and contracts.
Designed and launched a search fund vehicle to acquire and grow a profitable business leveraging user insights and operational excellence.
Launched and grew digital community for NBCUniversal's comedy SVOD (Seeso).
Introduced self-serve analytics and audience segmentation to drive retention and inform programming.
Directed editorial slate, newsletter, and partnerships for technical and non-technical users.
Drove customer research, 0-to-1 product launches, and managed operational dashboards.
Led analytics/KPI rollouts and dashboarding for digital marketing channels.
Launched operational and reporting processes across org.

positions.position: Interim Vice President, Strategy & Business Development (NBC Digital)
highlights: Developed segmentations and user growth strategies for new business lines integrating product, research, and comms.
Produced and scaled community, live, and digital events for thousands of members.
Launched and nurtured successful affinity, learning, and online user groups.
Drove agile transformation, platform launches, and user onboarding flow redesigns for digital market/community products.
Currently lead 1,143-member global alumni association.
Oversaw largest Princeton class reunion (2,000+ participants, $1mm+ budget).
Established new continuing education program for alumni community (online/offline).
Championed and grew participation rates to all-time highs (annual giving, engagement).

positions.position: Elected Class Officer, Alumni Council Executive Committee
highlights: Chair, Communications & Technology Committee.
Led webinars, class traditions, and user community working groups.
Lead largest regional business school alumni chapter; organized educational & networking programming for 1,000+ users.
Engaged diverse membership in online/offline events and communications.
Advised on school-wide curriculum, engagement, and DEI initiatives impacting thousands of students and alumni.
Co-founded and co-chaired affinity/identity networks; designed tracking for progress.

publications.name: Reunions 2025: Conversation with President Eisgruber
highlights: Facilitated university-wide conversation, highlighting communications and community expertise.

publications.name: WineTaster3 (iOS Product)
highlights: Developed iOS app from scratch for technical/statistical user community; open-sourced analytics components.

publications.name: The Little Streaming Comedy Platform That Couldn't (Vulture)
highlights: Oral history of community building at Seeso, NBCUniversal's digital comedy platform.

education.institution: Tuck School of Business at Dartmouth

education.studyType: A.B., Economics & Certificates in Finance, Political Philosophy
